title: Aging Infrastructure May Create Higher Flood Risk in L.A., Study Finds
description: Between 197,000 and 874,000 city residents could experience a foot of flooding during an extreme storm, scientists found. Most of them donâ€™t live in beachfront mansions.
dc:creator: Raymond Zhong
media:description: Water raced down the Los Angeles River in February 2019 as a powerful storm drenched California.
